ExpSyntax.val: FlwMtr(StrBuild('ERROR GetConversionData: Conversion ID not found for productId: @1@ and transactionId: @2@ !',Trim(Str({0,2123366402},VarPic('{0,2123366402}'VAR,0))),Trim(Str({0,2123366401},VarPic('{0,2123366401}'VAR,0)))),'FALSE'LOG)
FlwMtr('ERROR GetConversionData: Mandatory parameters not present!','FALSE'LOG)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT d2.epp_id "CAPC_ID" FROM documents_links l INNER JOIN documents d ON d.id = l.document_id AND d.type = ( SELECT t.id FROM document_types t WHERE t.code = 'TRANS' ) INNER JOIN documents d2 ON d2.id = l.source_document_id AND d2.type = ( SELECT t2.id FROM document_types t2 WHERE t2.code = 'CAPC_ID' ) WHERE d.epp_id = ~1

SELECT be1.be_volgnummer "OLD_BE_ID", p.capc_aantal "OLD_CONVERSIONVALUE", be2.be_volgnummer "NEW_BE_ID", o.cavp_aantal_nieuwe_fonds "NEW_CONVERSIONVALUE"
FROM productconversie_ontvangsten o INNER JOIN productconversies p ON p.capc_fondssymbool = o.cavp_fondssymbool AND p.capc_actiedatum = o.cavp_actiedatum INNER JOIN beleggingsinstrument be1 ON be1.be_symbool = p.capc_fondssymbool AND be1.be_optietype = ' ' AND be1.be_expiratiedatum = '00000000' AND be1.be_exerciseprijs = 0 INNER JOIN beleggingsinstrument be2 ON be2.be_symbool = o.cavp_nieuw_fondssymbool AND be2.be_optietype = ' ' AND be2.be_expiratiedatum = '00000000' AND be2.be_exerciseprijs = 0 WHERE p.capc_id = ~1

Text.val: To enable faster analysis of product conversions gone wrong, log output parameters:
